snippet: Second-ranked Novak Djokovic won his quarterfinal against Juan Martín del Potro, 6-2, 7-6 (3), 6-4, in front of a packed Arthur Ashe Stadium.
abstract: Greg Bishop On Tennis column notes that defending champion Novak Djokovic defeated Juan Martin del Potro to advance to the semifinals at the United States Open; contends that Djokovic has deserved more attention and respect from the media at this year's tournament.
lead_paragraph: Second-ranked Novak Djokovic won his quarterfinal against Juan Martín del Potro, 6-2, 7-6 (3), 6-4, in front of a packed Arthur Ashe Stadium.

headline.seo: Djokovic Pushes His Way Back Into Spotlight
